metadata.title: CVE-2024-45338 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An attacker can craft an input to the Parse functions that would beprocessed non-linearly with respect to its length, resulting in extremelyslow parsing. This could cause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45338` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

adsys - 0.14.3~22.04ubuntu0.1
adsys-windows - 0.14.3~22.04ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

golang-golang-x-net-dev - 1:0.0+git20211209.491a49a+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: adsys package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.14.3~22.04ubuntu0.1').
golang-golang-x-net package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.0+git20211209.491a49a+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
